title: Stonehaven Academy
description: An online learning platform with video tutorials for becoming a D&D dungeonmaster. Built with team of 5 following agile methodology. Future plans include user progress tracking and customizable themes.

title: Concentration
description: A desktop web app version of the classic memory game to find matching pairs in the shortest time possible.

title: Aura
description: An application that lets users search for LA-based venues by activity and ambience. Built with team of 7 following agile methodology.

title: Connect Four
description: A desktop web app take on the tabletop game to be first to connect four in a row. Includes sound effects and animations to simulate the actual game.

title: StreakBot
description: A Discord bot that allows players to track win streaks for king-of-the-hill-style competitions.
